original: 太原晉陽人，西晉官員。沉默寡言，故世人多以為其痴愚，但實際上才華內斂，又有相馬之術。後晉武帝悉之，稱讚其為「山濤以下，魏舒以上。」
text: A native of Jinyang, Taiyuan, an official of the Western Jin Dynasty. Taciturn, so most people think of it as foolishness, but in fact, talent is restrained, but also has the skill of horses. Emperor Wu of the later Jin Dynasty learned of it and praised it as 'below the mountain and above Wei Shu.'
